sentences.en: VA patients are sent to community hospitals for inpatient care.
sentences.cn: 军转医院患者在社区医院里接受住院治疗。

sentences.en: The atmosphere on an inpatient ward is tense because of this exerted energy.
sentences.cn: 由于这种表露的干劲，住院病房的氛围很紧张。

sentences.en: Patients were recruited from inpatient, outpatient, and emergency department settings.
sentences.cn: 患者是从住院部、门诊部和急诊部招募的。
